_DESCRIPTION: Since childhood, I compete responsibly my hobbies with my education and now also with work. Always eager to learn and discover new goals. I have a great capacity for learning and I'm easily comfortable in work groups. I consider myself responsible and although I am not an expert in something concrete, I have the basic notions of many things, which helps me to learn nimbly. I like competitiveness and I think that with humility and ambition everything is much simpler. I enjoy helping others and sharing the knowledge I know.
_DESCRIPTION_2: I have mostly focused my work as a front-end developer, achieving great skill and agility in web development with Single Page Applications, thanks mostly to a specialization in Angular. However, I have expanded my knowledge in the last year in DevOps processes and technologies, teaching my co-workers repeatedly what I have been learning. In addition, in recent months I have been trained in Cloud technologies and infrastructure deployment with Terraform and Amazon Web Services, mainly.
_DXC_DESCRIPTION: Digital Insurance Platform Engineering: web application and framework developer with Angular and React. DevOps Engineering: design, implementation and automation in continuous development and continuous integration (CI/CD) with GitHub, Docker, Jenkins, Artifactory and Amazon Web Services. Cloud Engineering: Terraform and Amazon Web Services.
_FREELANCE_DESCRIPTION: Application developer for web and mobile apps, orientation to small business in the web universe. Platforms: Google Cloud Platform, Google Marketing Platform. Technologies: Angular, Ionic, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, Firebase, Sass, Bitbucket, GitHub, Google Analytics...
_CSC_DESCRIPTION: Software development in JAVA team. Web application development based on JavaScript and AngularJS at front-end side. OmniChannel project.
_INDRA_DESCRIPTION: Software developer with JAVA, Oracle databases, Spring and Adobe Flex. Inverse engineering (UML) on C++ code from SACTA system.
_DEGREE: Computer Science Engineering of Information Technologies degree.
_GIT_WORKFLOW: Git flow suitable for the development project. Trunk based develoment or Gitflow as favorites
_TEAMWORK: Team work, help and learn from teammates
_VERSION_CONTROL: Version control, the most important to keep the code safe
_GET_IN_TOUCH_MESSAGE: If you like my work, don't hesitate to send me your ideas to build a new web page for your bussiness. Do you think I could be a member of your team? I am always searching for some new challenges. Please, write me below!
_AUTOMATION: Recurrent process automation to increase productivity and avoid errors
